@@ -0,0 +1,20 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout
+  xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="fill_parent"
+  android:layout_height="fill_parent"
+  android:orientation="vertical"
+   android:background="@drawable/bg2"
+ >
+  
+  <TextView
+  	android:layout_width="fill_parent"
+  	android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+  	android:text="@string/hello"
+  	android:id="@+id/day_tv"
+  	android:gravity="center"/>
+  	<ExpandableListView
+  		android:layout_width="fill_parent"
+  		android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+  		android:id="@+id/elv"/>
+</LinearLayout>

@@ -0,0 +1,105 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout
+  xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+  android:layout_width="fill_parent"
+  android:layout_height="fill_parent"
+  android:padding="10dip"
+  android:orientation="vertical">
+  
+    <TextView 
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_width="fill_parent"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="20dip"
+        android:layout_marginRight="20dip"
+        android:text="@string/new_class"
+        android:gravity="left"
+        android:textAppearance="?android:attr/textAppearanceMedium" />
+      <EditText
+        android:id="@+id/new_class"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_width="fill_parent"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="20dip"
+        android:layout_marginRight="20dip"
+        android:scrollHorizontally="true"
+        android:autoText="false"
+        android:capitalize="none"
+        android:gravity="fill_horizontal"
+        android:textAppearance="?android:attr/textAppearanceMedium" />
+      <TextView
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_width="fill_parent"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="20dip"
+        android:layout_marginRight="20dip"
+        android:text="@string/week"
+        android:gravity="left"
+        android:textAppearance="?android:attr/textAppearanceMedium" />       
+    <EditText
+        android:id="@+id/new_week"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_width="fill_parent"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="20dip"
+        android:layout_marginRight="20dip"
+        android:scrollHorizontally="true"
+        android:autoText="false"
+        android:capitalize="none"
+        android:gravity="fill_horizontal"
+        android:textAppearance="?android:attr/textAppearanceMedium" />
+      
+      <TextView
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_width="fill_parent"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="20dip"
+        android:layout_marginRight="20dip"
+        android:text="@string/address"
+        android:gravity="left"
+        android:textAppearance="?android:attr/textAppearanceMedium" />       
+    <EditText
+        android:id="@+id/new_address"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_width="fill_parent"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="20dip"
+        android:layout_marginRight="20dip"
+        android:scrollHorizontally="true"
+        android:autoText="false"
+        android:capitalize="none"
+        android:gravity="fill_horizontal"
+        android:textAppearance="?android:attr/textAppearanceMedium" />
+
+     <TextView 
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_width="fill_parent"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="20dip"
+        android:layout_marginRight="20dip"
+        android:text="@string/teacher"
+        android:gravity="left"
+        android:textAppearance="?android:attr/textAppearanceMedium" />
+        <EditText
+        android:id="@+id/new_teacher"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_width="fill_parent"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="20dip"
+        android:layout_marginRight="20dip"
+        android:scrollHorizontally="true"
+        android:autoText="false"
+        android:capitalize="none"
+        android:gravity="fill_horizontal"
+        android:textAppearance="?android:attr/textAppearanceMedium" />
+	<RelativeLayout
+		android:layout_width="fill_parent"
+		android:layout_height="wrap_content">
+		<Button
+			android:layout_marginLeft="20dip"
+			android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+			android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+			android:id="@+id/insert_ok"
+			android:text="@string/ok"
+			android:layout_alignParentLeft="true"/>
+		<Button
+			android:layout_marginRight="20dip"
+			android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+			android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+			android:id="@+id/insert_cancel"
+			android:text="@string/cancel"
+			android:layout_alignParentRight="true"/>
+	</RelativeLayout>
+</LinearLayout>

@@ -0,0 +1,22 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="fill_parent"
+    android:layout_height="fill_parent"
+    android:background="@drawable/bg1"
+    android:orientation="vertical" >
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/day"
+        android:layout_width="fill_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:gravity="center"
+        android:text="@string/hello" />
+
+    <ListView
+        android:id="@+id/ListView01"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="406dp"
+        android:layout_weight="0.26" >
+    </ListView>
+
+</LinearLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,44 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<resources>
+    <string name="hello">简易课程表!</string>
+    <string name="app_name">课表</string>
+<string name="mon">周一</string>
+<string name="tue">周二</string>
+<string name="wed">周三</string>
+<string name="thu">周四</string>
+<string name="fri">周五</string>
+<string name="sat">周六</string>
+<string name="sun">周日</string>
+<string name="c0">第一节</string>
+<string name="c1">第二节</string>
+<string name="c2">第三节</string>
+<string name="c3">第四节</string>
+<string name="c4">第五节</string>
+<string name="c5">第六节</string>
+<string name="c6">第七节</string>
+<string name="c7">第八节</string>
+<string name="c8">第九节</string>
+<string name="c9">第十节</string>
+<string name="c10">第十一节</string>
+
+<string name="group_insert">添加课程</string>
+<string name="week">周数:</string>
+<string name="new_class">新增课程:</string>
+<string name="address">课室:</string>
+<string name="ok">确认</string>
+<string name="cancel">取消</string>
+<string name="none">空</string>
+<string name="del">删除</string>
+<string name="insert_suc">已添加，后退以刷新页面</string>
+<string name="insert_fail">添加课程失败\n\n提示：\n每节课中的课程名不能重复</string>
+<string name="insert_none">课程名不能为空</string>
+<string name="del_suc">已删除,后退以刷新页面</string>
+<string name="del_fail">删除失败</string>
+<string name="help">帮助</string>
+<string name="about">关于</string>
+<string name="add">添加</string>
+<string name="help_text">在课程页面长按 某课节 会弹出添加课程菜单。\n长按 已有课程 会弹出删除课程菜单。</string>
+<string name="about_text">课程表是每个学生都需要用到的……</string>
+<string name="teacher">任课老师:</string>
+<string name="exit">退出</string>
+</resources>
